project_abstract.cdata: The Estreito Hydroelectric Power Project will assist in financing equipment and materials for the transmission facilities which constitute the second stage of the Estreito Hydroelectric Project. The second stage of the project consists of two high-voltage transmission lines to the cities of Rio de Janeiro and Sao Paulo, respectively, of short high-voltage lines connecting sub-stations around the city of Rio de Janeiro and the related expansion of sub-stations.
